text: Chasing the Sun is an album recorded by American saxophonist Ken McIntyre in 1978 for the SteepleChase label.SteepleChase Records discography accessed March 16, 2015Makanda Ken McIntyre discography accessed March 16, 2015Fitzgerald, M., Makanda Ken McIntyre Discography, accessed March 16, 2015 ==Reception== Allmusic awarded the album 4 stars.Allmusic Listing accessed March 16, 2015 ==Track listing== All compositions by Ken McIntyre # "I Close My Eyes" - 6:25 # "Coconut Bread" - 7:00 # "El Hajj Malik" - 5:30 # "Puddin'" - 6:00 # "Got My Mind Set on Freedom" - 5:10 # "High Noon" - 4:23 # "Chasing the Sun" - 3:45 == Personnel == *Ken McIntyre - alto saxophone, flute, bassoon, oboe, bass clarinet *Hakim Jami - bass *Beaver Harris - drums == References == Category:1979 albums Category:Makanda Ken McIntyre albums Category:SteepleChase Records albums
title: Chasing the Sun (Ken McIntyre album)
